Flightstar Extends Learjet 40 and 45 Life with DU-875 Upgrade
Learjet 40 and 45 operators depend on clear views and reliability to get them from point a to point b in the most efficient way possible. The DU-875 upgrade with Honeywell Authorized Service Center Flightstar provides operators one of the clearest views and provides an upgrade path to Primus Elite, plus it offers:
• Uplinked Graphical Weather • Geo-political Boundaries • Navigation aids (NAVAIDS) • And much more…
Check out what others are saying: “The improved avionics of the DU-875 assist us with our medevac flights because they’re often at very short notice…The better display clarity and the data available on those displays really makes it a lot easier for the flight crew to become familiar with the airport that they’re operating into” – Lorne Cole, managing director, JetCity.
For a limited time, Honeywell is offering a trade-in credit for Learjet 40 and 45 operators. So, you can save up to $160,000* when you trade-in all four displays. Plus, when you choose Flightstar’s ADS-B Out STC, Flightstar will waive the STC cost. Contact Flightstar today to take advantage of these special offers as they expire soon.
UPGRADE TODAY <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Flightstar_D875_ADSB.html]]>
*Operators can save up to $160,000 when they trade-in all four (4) of their DU-870 display units. Minimum purchase of two (2) Honeywell DU-875 displays are required to waive the purchase cost of Flightstar’s one time use of STC (ST04064CH) for ADS-B OUT. Installation of the aircraft ADS-B OUT and DU-875 displays must be performed at Flightstar Corporation, Savoy IL.
